title: Prefigurative Community Building (Part 39): Sanctuary Networks & Immigration Accompaniment - A Power With Path to Collective Protection
summary: A guide to building sanctuary and accompaniment networks that resist immigration enforcement through horizontal coordination and community-led safety practices.

Community.summary: Build networks of mutual protection that resist immigration enforcement through collective action and horizontal support.
